label: A2B5_mC28_15_f_e2f-001
title: B$_{2}$Pd$_{5}$ Structure
comments:
Although the earliest entry in the ICSD for this structure refers to B$_{2}$Pd$_{5}$, they designate C$_{2}$Mn$_{5}$ as the prototype for this system. 
 The ICSD lists \href{current_web_home_dir/A4BC2_mC28_15_2f_e_f-001}{Sm$_{2}$SCl$_{4}$} under this structure, but we find the two forms sufficiently different to justify listing that as a new prototype. 
 B$_{2}$Pd$_{5}$ and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B5_mC28_15_f_e2f-003}{Nb$_{2}$O$_{5}$} share the same AFLOW prototype label, A2B5\_mC28\_15\_f\_e2f, but have substantially different environments around each atom.  The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
